articles.author: Joel Achenbach
articles.title: A rare look at NASA’s next sharp-eyed space telescope - The Washington Post
articles.description: NASA's Roman Space Telescope is preparing for launch in 2027, with a mission to study distant galaxies and explore dark energy.
articles.content: The next great space telescope will study distant galaxies and faraway planets from an orbital outpost about a million miles from Earth. But first it has to be put together, piece by piece, in a cave… [+8896 chars]

articles.title: New Silurian aculiferan fossils reveal complex early history of Mollusca - Nature.com
articles.description: Fossils of two new worm-like aculiferan species add to the diversity of this group, showing that evolution in early aculiferans generated unusual forms comparable to other crown-group molluscs.
